metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Persona 5 Royal - Colors Flying High is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Persona 5 Royal - Colors Flying High has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Minor,  and G Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
